name: merge-settings
description: Merge settings from several sources into your workspace settings

mergeSettings.useWorkspaceFolders.description: Get default settings from all workspace folders

mergeSettings.workspaceFolderSettingsFil.description: The file to merge the settings in your workspace folders if `useWorkspaceFolders` is enabled

mergeSettings.workspaceFolderExtensionsF.description: The file to merge the extensions in your workspace folders if `useWorkspaceFolders` is enabled

mergeSettings.sourceSettingsFiles.description: A list of files to load default settings from. A file can be a path on the local file system, or a URL.

mergeSettings.sourceExtensionsFiles.description: A list of files to load default extensions. A file can be a path on the local file system, or a URL.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
